Text: Looking forward to hearing Cecilia Bartoli sing! Could you tell a bit more about it? Is it from a DVD or a video and how's the picture and the sound quality?

Don't know if it is a video or dvd, just find it on the net for a couple a years ago. 
The quality is not the best but really ok. 
The sound is really good. I think you will love this one like I did.
